sentences.english: Depressants are alcohol, barbiturates and sedatives.

sentences.english: We also have fitness for duty programmes, which is drug and alcohol.

sentences.english: For unknown reasons, people with alcoholic liver disease often have hepatitis C as well.

sentences.english: It is specially established to prepare solidified alcohol in applied chemistry experiment.

sentences.english: Drink hot soup or a large number of drinking water, with dilutes alcohol concentration.
